_sText: bhop\_strafe\_sepulchre ================== A short map set in an egyptian sepulchre. I made this map within two days, so it may be lacking some detail. The main purpose of this map is speed running, so it's short enough for no-fail runs. In the end there is only a little longjump section, for players who have finished or are too bored for another run and prevent rtv. **This is a _strafe map, it forces sv\_enablebunnyhopping 0, limiting the amount of speed you can get from jumps. You cannot rely on good jumps to finish this map, so you must use proper strafing.** For me many maps in Source are too long to do proper speed runs. I think this is a map length which is good for speed runs, where the really best strafing and no-fail run counts. Use 300 fps, 100 tick, no scouts, no cheats. I hope you have fun playing this and that this map will inspire many other mappers, to do more maps like this, which require proper strafing. Thanks to [badges](http://gamebanana.com/members/883044 "badges' profile") for the great idea of just using sv\_enablebunnyhopping 0. Have fun, keyuu
